content.html: I deleted an incorrect tweet about mitigations. Here's the correction: PoC is here: github.com/tangxiaofeng7/… (and it's legit, I've seen verification). Mitigation: update to log4j 2.10 and set the env var LOG4J_FORMAT_MSG_NO_LOOKUPS=true; OR upgrade to 2.15rc1 or above.
content.value:
I deleted an incorrect tweet about mitigations. Here's the correction:

PoC is here: github.com/tangxiaofeng7/… (and it's legit, I've seen verification). Mitigation: update to log4j 2.10 and set the env var  LOG4J_FORMAT_MSG_NO_LOOKUPS=true; OR upgrade to 2.15rc1 or above.
